column3: EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Nun ne babanyin Josua a nna ɔyɛ Moses no somfo no dɛ
column5: "M’akowaa Moses ewu; dɛm ntsi afei soɛr
column9: kɔ asaase a medze rema hom

column4: dɛ mbrɛ mekaa kyerɛɛ Moses no."

column3: nye Lebanon yi ho araa dze kodu esutsen kɛse Eufrates no ho
column5: na ɔdze kodu po kɛse no ho wɔ witɔree afamu no

column2: "Nyimpa biara runntum nngyina w’enyim wɔ wo nkwa nda nyinara mu: na dɛ mbrɛ midzii Moses n’ekyir no
column3: dɛmara so na mibedzi w’ekyir: meremmpa wo

column2: "Hyɛ dzen na nya akokodur: na ɔwo na ebɛma ɔman yi ekenya asaase a mekaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hɔn egyanom dɛ medze mebɛma hɔn no edzi."
"Dzen ara na hyɛ na nya akokodur papaapa
column3: na dwen do dzi mbra a m’akowaa Moses hyɛɛ wo no nyinara do: mma mmfi ho mmfa enyimfa anaa abankum
column4: ama eesi wo yie wɔ beebiara a ebɔkɔ."

column3: na mbom dwen ho adzekyee nye adzesaa
column4: ama aadwen do ayɛ dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw wɔ mu no nyinara tse no: na ɔno na ebɛma wo kwan ayɛ dwudwoodwo
column5: na ɔno na ibenya no yie."

column2: "Ana mennhyɛɛ wo bi a? Hyɛ dzen na nya akokodur; mma mmbɔ hu
column3: nkyii so mma w’abaw mu nntu: na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dzi w’ekyir wɔ beebiara a ebɔkɔ."

column2: "Nna Josua hyɛɛ ɔman no hɔn ahwɛdofo no
column5: "Hom ndɔ nseraban no mu na hom nhyɛ ɔman no dɛ
column7: na aka ndaansa hom botwa Jordan yi akɔ akɛfa asaase a EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dze rema hom dɛ wɔnkɛfa no."

column4: nye Manaasɛ ebusuakuw ɔfa no dɛ
column6: "Hom nkaa asɛm a EWURADZE n’akowaa Moses hyɛɛ hom no
column8: EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn rema hom ahomgye
column9: na ɔdze asaase yi ama hom no."

column5: ntsena asaase a Moses dze maa hom wɔ Jordan egya yi do; na homara dze
column6: hom mmia ndzi hom nuanom enyim ntwa

column2: "ma onkodu dɛ EWURADZE bɛma hom nuanom ahomgye
column3: dɛ mbrɛ ɔdze ama hom yi
column4: na hɔn so woeenya asaase a EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dze rema hom no afa: na n’ekyir no hom asan abɛfa hom enyadze asaase a EWURADZE n’akowaa Moses dze maa hom wɔ Jordan egya ɔdze kɔ wipuei afamu no."
Dza edze ahyɛ hɛn nyinara yɛbɛyɛ
column5: na beebiara a ebɔsoma hɛn no

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ yetsiee Moses wɔ adze nyinara mu no
column3: dɛmara so na yebetsie wo: w’ekyir ara na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ndzi
column4: dɛ mbrɛ odzii Moses ekyir no."

column2: "Nyimpa biara a ɔbɛtsew etua wɔ wo mbrasɛm do
column3: na onnketsie wo nsɛm wɔ dza edze hyɛ no nyinara mu no
column4: ɔtse dɛ woana ara a wonku no: dzen ara na hyɛ na nya akokodur."
